headline.main: LUZON DEFENDERS WIN LOCAL VICTORY; Isolated Unit 200 Miles From Manila Gains in Valley -- MacArthur Line Firm LUZON DEFENDERS WIN LOCAL VICTORY A SUCCESS IN LUZON

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 1 -- The lull that followed the general advance of General Douglas MacArthur's forces against the Japanese in the Battle of Bataan in the Philippines continued throughout yesterday, a communique issued by the War Department this afternoon reported.
